Title: An Act Converting Gapan Provincial High School Situated in the Municipality of Gapan, Province of Nueva Ecija, into a National High School to be Known as the Gapan National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 143
An Act Converting Gapan Provincial High School Situated in the Municipality of Gapan, Province of Nueva Ecija, into a National High School to be Known as the Gapan National High School
Section 1. The Gapan Provincial High School situated in the Municipality of Gapan, Province of Nueva Ecija, is hereby converted into national high school to be known as the Gapan National High School.
Section 2. The Ministry of Education and Culture is hereby directed to take steps as are necessary for the conversion, operation and immediate implementation of this Act.
Section 3. The amount of two hundred thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be charged to the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 80 for the Ministry of Education and Culture intended for new national schools. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be provided for in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
Approved: February 8, 1982
